selected_skills.name: interpret_angle_from_diagram
selected_skills.purpose: To interpret the angle of the clock hands from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the angle between the clock hands from the image data.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the interpreted angle to the correct time word option.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to match the angle to the corresponding time word option from the provided list.
